li.label: Semi-Feral
li.description: Early in {PAWN_possessive} life, {PAWN_nameDef} spent a short period in the wild, without any contact with other sapient life. Using only {PAWN_possessive} animal instincts, {PAWN_nameDef} managed to survive with no education or interaction with sapient beings. Fortunately, {PAWN_pronoun} was eventually found and adopted into modern society, where {PAWN_nameDef} was able to pick up social skills and make up for much of the isolation {PAWN_pronoun} once experienced. \n However, missing such a critical part of {PAWN_possessive} life means that {PAWN_nameDef} will always have trouble studying, conversing, and controlling {PAWN_possessive} emotions. {PAWN_nameDef} will sometimes temporarily revert to an animalistic rage and throw a tantrum.

li.label: Rock Expert
li.description: Independent of whether or not {PAWN_pronoun} was actually formally schooled in the topic, {PAWN_nameDef} is the very model of a modern major geologist. {PAWN_pronoun} has information mineral, mineral, and mineral! In short, in matters mineral, mineral, and mineral, {PAWN_pronoun} is the very model of a modern major geologist!

li.label: Rincewind
li.description: "Dead is only for once, but running away is for ever." \n -Noted Runner
